title: Update: Bert Needed A Few Really Stiff Drinks After The Week He’s Had
description:
We’ve all had moments when we feel like everything in our life is just piling up on top of each other. Like, every time you turn around something else isn’t going right and needs your attention. This week has been just that for Bert. Between his Fiancé’s health, his mom’s dementia, and his dog Riggins getting older, Bert just feels like he can’t catch a break.
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
